text: did you know in this game where you play
as Pinocchio you're going to have to
choose whether you'll lie or not and a
perfect example of this is this side
quest a woman is locked inside because
of the plague and she asks you to find
her baby when you find it it's a puppet
and when you return you'll be met with
the option to tell her that's a puppet
or she's cute baby a puppet would just
tell the truth but Pinocchio is
different so you can make him lie and
that will save her feelings what you
decide will lead you down the path of
being a puppet or a real boy and will
change the course of the game
